Package org.projet.model.building

Class Building

java.lang.Object
org.projet.model.building.Building
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourcesConsumer, ResourcesProvider, Purchasable, Resource
public class Building extends Object implements Purchasable, ResourcesProvider, ResourcesConsumer
The class representing a building which provides and consumes resources and can be purchased

  • Constructor Details

    • Building

      protected Building(Building.Type type, int price, int nbHabitants, int minWorkers, Resources buildRequirements, Resources consumption, Resources production, int buildTime)
      Parameters:
      type - Building type
      price - Cost in gold to purchase the building
      nbHabitants - The number of habitants created with the building
      minWorkers - The minimum number of workers needed to create the building
      buildRequirements - The materials needed to create the building
      consumption - The materials consumed by the building
      production - The materials produced by the building
      buildTime - The time needed for the building to be operational

  • Method Details

    • canAddWorkers

      public boolean canAddWorkers(int quantity)
      Parameters:
      quantity - The quantity of workers to add
      Returns:
      true if the workers can be added to the building

      public boolean canRemoveWorkers(int quantity)
      Parameters:
      quantity - The quantity of workers to remove
      Returns:
      true if the workers can be removed from the building

      public void upgrade()
